documentation.text: Provides functionality of the HASHI bridge
White list of ERC-20 ethereum native tokens

White lists of ERC-20 SORA native tokens
 We use several representations of the white list for optimisation purposes.

 We use several representations of the white list for optimisation purposes.

params.newPeerAddress: address of the peer to add

params.initialPeers: - list of initial bridge validators on substrate side.
params.networkId: id of current EvM network used for bridge purpose.

params.amount: amount of tokens or ether to withdraw
params.tokenAddress: address of token to withdraw (0 for ether)

params.peerAddress: address of the peer to remove

params.tokenAddress: contract address of token to send

params.erc20nativeTokens: list of ERC20 tokens with non zero balances for this contract. Can be taken from substrate bridge peers.
params.newContractAddress: address of the new bridge contract
params.salt: unique data used for signature generation

_sidechainTokens(bytes32).notice: White lists of ERC-20 SORA native tokens We use several representations of the white list for optimisation purposes.
